ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Necro Question
ygData.msgSnippet: One way to do it, after you put at least one point in each of the Specialize s, and you ve made the decision about which line you want to specialize in (i.e.
ygData.messageBody:
One way to do it, after you put at least one point in
each of the Specialize's, and you've made the decision
about which line you want to specialize in (i.e.
alteration), find a level 1 spell that uses alteration
and cast it on yourself until Specialize Alteration
hits 51. After that, none of the others will go above
lvl 50 and you are "officially" specialized in
alteration. :)

--- Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@...> wrote:
> The 20th level specializations for INT casters is
> what
> I mean. I found out the hard way and my chosen
> Specialty never went up.
>
> You have to put 1 point into Abjure Specialization,
> Alteration Specialization , etc or else the one you
> want , won't move.
>
> Make sense. Just put more points into the one you
> choose and make sure that is the one that hits 50
> first.
>
> Make sense?
>
>
> rob
> --- j s <jstrackeicg@...> wrote:
> > Actually i do have a question, When you say put a
> > point in to each one, i was under the impression
> > that you could only specilaize in one area of
> > spells. As of right now i am at 95 skill level in
> > all my spell disciplines. I still have aprox. 75
> > "trains" left. Thanks for taking the time to
> answer
> > my question.
> >


=====
